thread.title: Bill Belichick’s Trade With The Saints For Brandin Cooks Was So One-Sided That It Gets Rejected In Madden ’17
thread.title_full: Bill Belichick’s Trade With The Saints For Brandin Cooks Was So One-Sided That It Gets Rejected In Madden ’17

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Bill Belichick’s Trade With The Saints For Brandin Cooks Was So One-Sided That It Gets Rejected In Madden ’17
text:
We all know that Bill Belichick is an amazing but it turns out that he’s the GOAT GM as well. 
The Patriots' trades for Kony Ealy and Brandin Cooks became official today pic.twitter.com/a26RUMrOij 
— Ben Volin (@BenVolin) March 11, 2017 

Last week, Belichick was able to execute trade with the Saints for Brandin Cooks and it was so one-sided that the trade gets rejected in Madden. 
The Patriots' trades for Kony Ealy and Brandin Cooks became official today pic.twitter.com/a26RUMrOij 
— Ben Volin (@BenVolin) March 11, 2017
